body:
bernhard,

 

i will try and get them together for you today.

 

ashley

 

from: bernhard posselt [mailto:notifications@github.com] 
sent: thursday, march 21, 2013 07:59
to: owncloud/core
cc: ashleysbuss
subject: re: [core] ie 10 progress icon never clears oc 5.0 (#2506)

 

can you post logs?

@deepdiver1975 <https://github.com/deepdiver1975>  

â€”
reply to this email directly or view it on github <https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/2506#issuecomment-15239893> .  <https://github.com/notifications/beacon/ucb95mze9rrck5otcwmyaenuevbcnfso9du16x9z7nnpqzlt34k0kkzj-hzthnce.gif>

@ashleysbuss i just tested ie10 against a linux server environment and the issue cannot be reproduced here.
i assume the issue is related to the windows server installation.
can i ask you to retest this with the git branch stable5?
it contains already fixes for windows server which will be shipped with 5.0.1.

thx

thomas,

 

i would be only too glad to update and try out the fixes but i donâ€™t see them on the owncloud.org site or on github, sorry.

 

ashley

 

from: thomas mã¼ller [mailto:notifications@github.com] 
sent: tuesday, march 26, 2013 13:51
to: owncloud/core
cc: ashleysbuss
subject: re: [core] ie 10 progress icon never clears oc 5.0 (#2506)

 

@ashleysbuss <https://github.com/ashleysbuss>  i just tested ie10 against a linux server environment and the issue cannot be reproduced here.
i assume the issue is related to the windows server installation.
can i ask you to retest this with the git branch stable5?
it contains already fixes for windows server which will be shipped with 5.0.1.

thx

â€”
reply to this email directly or view it on github <https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/2506#issuecomment-15484229> .  <https://github.com/notifications/beacon/ucb95mze9rrck5otcwmyaenuevbcnfso9du16x9z7nnpqzlt34k0kkzj-hzthnce.gif>

>  or on github, sorry.

this is the branch:
https://github.com/owncloud/core/tree/stable5

you can pull it via git command line tool or download it on the site above

hallo deepdiver, 

i habe the same problems with 5.0.3:
owncloud 5.0.3 on windows 2008r2 64bit 4gb with php 5.3 and mysql. 

which logs do you need?

thanks, 
nils

afaik this issue is client side only - but you never know.

please have a look at the browser console and on the server in data/owncloud.log

hallo i do not thinks that this is the client. the test wirh safari and firefox maked the same issue. 
when i take an owncloud linux server every browsers works fine. 

i send the logs when i am at home. 

thanks!!

please disable as many apps as possible i'm thinking especially about search, version and trashbin.
i have not yet been able to test these apps on windows server environment.

hallo deepdiver, we have the bad app found:

only on and everything is ok:
calendar
contacts

then i turned on in this order and tested every action:
deleted files > ok
full text search > ok
versions > ok
image viewer > ok
media > ok
odf viewer > ok
pdf viewer > ok
>>>>>>>>>>>>pictures > bã„ã„ã„m, nothing ok! the same problems!

turned picture off, everything ok and testing:
text editor > ok
updater > ok
video viewer > ok
share files > ok
bookmarks > ok
user account miration > ok
owncloud instance migration > ok
owncloud's dependencies informations > ok
impress > ok
external user support > ok
external > ok
issues is related to the gallery
